class_notes: The delivery format listed for this class is based on current university guidelines.  However, if there are further changes to the COVID19 guidelines for Fall 2021 or other acts beyond our control, the school reserves the right the modify the delivery method for this class.
course_description: The United States Healthcare system is in desperate need of a strategy.  Using different strategy tools, we will analyze industries, and companies to see how they can compete differently for competitive advantage. Healthcare costs in the US are 15%+ of GDP and some estimate that more than 1/3 of that is waste.  The class will address this important, complex, and challenge problem together.
prerequisites: This section is reserved for students in the One-Year or Two-Year MBA program.
sections: Class Nbr: 5632, Section #: 3246, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 10-11:15a, Instructor: J. Kim, Status: Open
